## Marketplace.getAllListings() method

Get all the listings

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAllListings(filter?: MarketplaceFilter): Promise<(AuctionListing | DirectListing)[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  filter | MarketplaceFilter | optional filters |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;(AuctionListing \| DirectListing)\[\]&gt;

## Remarks

Fetch all the active listings from this marketplace contract.

```javascript
const listings = await contract.getAllListings();
const priceOfFirstListing = listings[0].price;
```
